name: Mountain Racers HD - Free Racing Game for iPad!
name_original: Mountain Racers HD - Free Racing Game for iPad!
description:
Do you want to drive fancy cars? If so, you've come to the right place!

This is one of the most addictive and entertaining physics-based driving game ever made! And it's free!

You are about to embark a journey that will take you to where no ride has ever been before. You must not rest before you conquer the mountain and become the ultimate racer.

Here's what you'll get:
- Lots of stages with levels to get challenged
- Play with a lot of dreamed cars and bikes
- Get boosts (nitro) to increase speed
- Challenge your friends on Facebook and Twitter or players around the world
- and much more...

Download now, it's FREE!
